synopsis: This release introduces new set of APIs (wafv2) for AWS WAF. Major changes include single set of APIs for creating/updating resources in global and regional scope, and rules are configured directly into web ACL instead of being referenced. The previous APIs (waf and waf-regional) are now referred as AWS WAF Classic. For more information visit: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/waf/latest/APIReference/Welcome.html
